tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE claims (
    claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_owner_id INT,
    date_submitted DATE,
    damage_description TEXT,
    status ENUM('pending', 'approved', 'rejected')
);

CREATE TABLE claim_actions (
    action_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    claim_id INT,
    action_date DATETIME,
    action_description TEXT,
    action_taken_by VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Claims (
  claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  owner_id INT NOT NULL,
  claim_date DATE NOT NULL,
  claim_description VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  claim_status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (owner_id) REFERENCES PropertyOwners(owner_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Inspections (
  inspection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  claim_id INT NOT NULL,
  inspector_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  inspection_date DATE NOT NULL,
  inspection_notes TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (claim_id) REFERENCES Claims(claim_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Payments (
  payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  claim_id INT NOT NULL,
  payment_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  payment_date DATE NOT NULL,
  payment_method VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (claim_id) REFERENCES Claims(claim_id)
);

CREATE TABLE claims (
    claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    owner_id INT,
    claim_date DATE,
    claim_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    status VARCHAR(20)
);
